title: Is there a charge for using GPS on my phone?
answer:
The GPS on your phone does not require mobile data to be enabled and can be used free of charge. However, GPS positioning is more accurate when used in combination with a mobile data or Wi-Fi connection. 

 When you use navigation apps to browse online maps or plot a route, a mobile data connection is required. Your service provider will charge you for data usage. It is recommended that you download offline maps for your navigation app.
